gurmukhi: dyv pIr ibswr kY prmysR Awp khwNihgy ]nr BwNq BwNqn eyk ko jur eyk eyk aufwNihgy ]
transliteration: Dev Phir Bisaar Kai Parmesra Aap Kahaahenge|| Nar Bhaant Bhaantan Ek Ko Jur Eke K Udaabenge||
translation: Forgetting the gods and Pirs, the people will call themselves God; several kinds of people will get together and spread various types of rumours;

gurmukhi: eyk mws dumws lO AD mws lO q clwNihgy ]AMq bUbr pwn ijau mq Awp hI imt jwNihgy ]19]
transliteration: Ek Maas Doumaas Lau Adh Maas Lau Ta Chalaabenge|| Ant Boobar Paan Jio Mat Aap Hi Mit Jaabenge||19||
translation: These new religions will continue for one or two month or even half a month and will ultimately end themselves lie the bubbles of water.19.

gurmukhi: byd Aaur kqyb ky do dUK kY mq fwr hYN ]ihq Awpny iqh Taur BIqr jMqR mMqR aucwr hYN ]
transliteration: Bed Aur Kateb Ke Do Dookh Kai Mat Daar Hain|| Hit Aapana Tih Thaur Bhitar Jantra Mantra Ouchaar Bain||
translation: Finding faults will the religions of Vedas and Katebs, they will be forsaken and the people will recite mantras and yantras according to their onw interest;

gurmukhi: muK byd Aaur kqyb ky koeI nwm lyv n dyhgy ]ikshUM n kaufI puMn qy kbhUM n ikau hI dyhgy ]20]
transliteration: Moukh Bed Aur Kateb Ke Koi Naam Lev Na Dihge|| Kis- Boon Na Kaudipounn Te Kab-boun Na Kio Hi Dehge||20||
translation: People will not be allowed ot utter the names of Vedas and Katebs and no one will give even a cowrie in charity.20.

gurmukhi: pwp krm krY jhwN qhwN Drm krm ibswr kY ]nhI dRb dyKq Cof hY lY puqR imqR sMGwr kY ]
transliteration: Paap Karam Darai Jahaan Tahaan Dharma Karam Bisaar Kai|| Nahi Drab Dekhat Chhodh Hai Lai Poutra Mitra Sanhaar Kai||
translation: Forgetting the actions of Dharma, the sinful actions will be committed and the money will be procured even by killing the son or friend;

gurmukhi: eyk nyk auTwie hY miq iBMn iBMn idnM idnw ]Pokty DrmM sBY kil kyvlM pRBxM ibnw ]21]
transliteration: Ek Nek Outhaae Hai Mat(i) Bhinn Bhinn Dinan Dinaa|| Phokte Dharman Sabhai Kal(i) Kevalan|| Prabhnan Binaa||
translation: New religions will arise always and these religions will be hollow without the name of the Lord.21.

gurmukhi: eyk idvs clY koaU mq doie idaus clwihgy ]niRp jor kRor kror kY idn qIsrY imt jwihgy ]
transliteration: Ek Divas Chalai Ko( i)  Mat Mat Doe Dios Chalaahege|| Nrip Jor Kror Daror Kai Din Teesrai Mit Jaabege||
translation: Some religions will continue for one or two days and on the third day these religions taking birth on account of power will die their own death;

gurmukhi: pun Aaur Aaur aucwhgy mqxogqM cqurQ idnM ]Drm Poktxo sBM iek kyvlM kilnM ibnM ]22]
transliteration: Poun Aur Aur Ouchaabge Matnogadan Chaturath Dinan|| Dharam Phoktand Sabhan Ik Kevalan Binan||22||
translation: Again on the fourth day new religions will arise, but they wil all be without the idea of salvation.22.

gurmukhi: CMd bMd jhwN qhwN nr nwr in`q ney krih ]pun jMqR mMqR jhwN qhwN nhI qMqRlwq kCU frih ]
transliteration: Chhand Band Jahaan Tahaan Nar Naar Nitt Nae Karah(i)|| Poun Jantra Mantra Jahaan Tahaan Nahitantralaat Kachhodh Darah(i)||
translation: The men and women will perform the works of deceit here and there; many mantras, yantras and tantras will spring up;

gurmukhi: Drm CqR auqwr kY rn Cor CqRI Bwj hYN ]sUdR bYs jhwN qhwN gih AsqR Awhv gwj hYN ]23]
transliteration: Dharamchhatra Outaar Kai Ran Chhodh Chhatri Bhaaj Bain|| Soodra Bais Jahaan Tahaan Gadb Astra Aabav Gadj Bain||23||
translation: Leaving the canopies of religions, the Kshatriyas will run away from fighting, and Shudras and Vaishyas will catch hold of weapons and arms and thunder in the battlefield.23.

gurmukhi: CqRIAwnI Cor kY nr nwh nIcn rwv hY ]qj rwj Aaur smwj ko giH nIc rwnI jwv hY ]
transliteration: Chhatreeaani Chhodh Kai Nar Naah Neechanndraav Hai|| Taj Raaj Aur Samaaj Ko Grab(i) Neech Raanijaav Hai||
translation: Leaving the functions of Kshatriyas, the kings will perform disgraceful tasks; the queens, leaving the kings, mix up with the low social orders;

gurmukhi: sUdR bHmsuqw Bey rq bHm sUdRI hoihgy ]byisXw bwl iblok kY munrwj DIrj Koihgy ]24]
transliteration: Soodra Brahmsoutaa Bhae Rat Brahm Soodri Hohege|| Besiyaa Baal Cilok Kai Mounndaaj Khonhege||24||
translation: Shudras will be absorbed with the Brahmins girls and the Brahmins will also do like wise; seeing the daughters of the prostitutes. The great sages will lose their forbearance.24.

gurmukhi: Drm Brm aufXo jhwN qhwN pwp pg pg hoihMgy ]inj is`K nwr gurU rmY gur dwrw so isK soihMgy ]
transliteration: Dharam Bharam Uduo Jahaan Tahaan Paap Pag Pag Hohenge Nij Sikkh Naar Guroo Ramai Gur Daaraa So Sikh Sohenge||
translation: The honour of religions will fly away and there will be sinful acts at every step; he Gurus will enjoy the wives of their disciples and the disciples will absorb themselves with the wives of their Gurus;

gurmukhi: Aibbyk Aauk ibbyk ko n ibbyk bYT ibcwr hYN ]pun JUT bol kmwihMgy isr swc bol auqwr hYN ]25]
transliteration: Abibek Aur Bibek Ko Na Bibek Baith Bichaar Bain|| Poun Jhouth Bol Kamaabenge Sit Saach Bol Outaar Bain||25||
translation: No attention will be paid to foolishness and wisdom and the head of the speaker of truth will be chopped; the falsehood will reign supreme.25.
